# Apigee - The big picture
You are currently viewing version 1.3 of the Apigee hybrid documentation. **This version is end of life.** You should upgrade to a newer version. For more information, see [Supported versions](/apigee/docs/hybrid/supported-platforms#supported-versions) .
Using Apigee hybrid is a three-part process (well, two parts and an ):
| 0                                                                                         | 1                                                          | 2                                                  |
|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Part 1: CONFIGURE GOOGLE CLOUD AND UI Get your project and organization set up with Google Cloud and hybrid UI. Prerequisites: Install gcloud CLI When you're done: Created Google Cloud account and project Enabled APIs Created an organization Added a domain and reserved a static IP address Created an environment and environment group 1: Configure it | Part 2: INSTALL THE RUNTIME Install the runtime in your cluster with this quickstart. Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 When you're done: Installed runtime Customized runtime Exposed MART At least one new environment 2: Install it | Post-install: TEST Check that everything is working as expected. Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 and Part 2 When you're done: Created and deployed a new proxy Checked deployment status 3: Test it |
